entity.role: Everything from programmer, developer, publisher, tester...
entity.name: Rahul Pujari
entity.description: I'm a developer interested AI and MAchine learning, especially whcih are useful for Robotics, because I am passionate about robotics and likes building stuff like drones, rovers and apps sometimes, at present am putting all my efforts into this single app. By the way also runs a YouTube channel but it's not running at all, it's crawling.

projects.guid: Img2VIdeo Web based application for android
projects.name: Img2VIdeo-creator
projects.description: I am trying to make on web based mobile app for android that allows you to create videos for YouTube shorts, Reels etc from just a Picture or a Video as input using AI, which helps in Text overlay, Outlining the text, converting an image into a video, breaking into clips as per the punctuations in the text input, avoidstext overlay on faces or main subject and a lot more. Soon will try to bring it on WIndows and iOS

channels.description: Will accept UPI transactions as I am from India and direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for any further details.

plans.name: To move any further
plans.description: I am stuck with my PC of with 8 GB RAM, which is unable to process video that are more than 30 sec(output) anything over 30 Sec just makes my PC stop working due to limited RAM and GPU then I need to forcefully restart the PC to run properly. So definitly need an upgrade to 16 or 32 GB RAM and a GPU

plans.name: Hosting support
plans.description: This will cover the monthly server hosting costs for this project. Ans also for me it costs more because I need to run this on a cloud server whcih must Contain Power CPU & GPU with a much more RAM, because obviously it's a Rendering software

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project. Especially for future upgrading of the App which I am thinking to add some features like Green Screen, Automatically Splits the video based on the video content and adding transitions

history.description: No donations in the past, Asking from Parents for monthly subscription of applications that help me in solving problems in the code like ChatGPT...
